title: 8.2 Master Challenge 1
question:
Lucy records her room temperature and stores it in an ArrayList, as shown.

If the temperature sensor fails, the temperature value will be zero. Lucy wants to analyze the temperature data by excluding the missing temperature values. She wants to move the missing temperature to the end of the list. Write a Java program to do so.

Sample output:

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
